Literature.Title: The human CXC chemokine granulocyte chemotactic protein 2 (GCP-2)/CXCL6 possesses membrane-disrupting properties and is antibacterial.
Literature.Author: Linge HM, Collin M, Nordenfelt P, Mörgelin M, Malmsten M, Egesten A
